::Zardus/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus and Perndabot crouch behind some bushes, being completely silent and 
concealed. Zardus looks over at Reptilica and Bloodystrike, hiding in the 
bushes on the other side of the natural path on which Iron Raptor and 
Tavatron were bound to pass.

The bushes on the side path were thick, too thick to move through quickly, 
but Zardus and co. were hiding in the thinnest parts, still concealed, but 
easier to get out of. The groups pulls out their weapons, waiting for the 
maximal commander and her friend.
